title: Electric Boogaloo

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Synchronize two players' movements with another's, redirecting the two players to the third player's target. If the third player has multiple targets, it will be the first one.
- Strike down a player at night. If they were ever attacked but survived somehow, kill them. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You only visit your third target with your first ability.
- If your targets are redirected into visiting you, they will all be roleblocked.
- Roleblock and redirect immune

desc:
Post 3117
*Are you shocked that I simply didn't leave the text as "disco is undead?"*
